Trade/Device Name(s): FLEX Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α, Clone EP1, Ready-to-Use (Link)
FLEX Monoclonal Mouse Anti-Human Progesterone Receptor, Clone PgR 636, Ready-to-Use (Link)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): EnVision FLEX High pH visualization kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FLEX Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α and FLEX Monoclonal Mouse Anti-Human Progesterone Receptor ready-to-use immunohistochemistry assays for breast carcinoma.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in immunohistochemistry to detect estrogen and progesterone receptor status in human breast carcinomas, used by a pathologist.
